definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: The days I do, my productivity soars.
sentences.chinese: 我这样做的日子，我的生产率大增。
引取零滑动设计，生产率高。

sentences.english: Therefore, process of manufacturing the surface light source device is simplified to enhance productivity.
sentences.chinese: 由此可以简化面光源器件的制造过程，提高生产率。

sentences.english: The lifting mechanism has an important impact on the productivity and performance of dump trucks.
sentences.chinese: 举升机构对自卸运输车的生产率及性能影响很大。

sentences.english: Mr. Salvendy accepted the offer, and the revolution began.
sentences.chinese: 萨文迪教授接受了邀请，一场生产率革命开始了。

sentences.english: Since Jiuquan iron ore concentrate has particularly chemical, mineralogical and sintering characters, the productivity of sinter made of, that concentrate is quite low.
sentences.chinese: 酒钢红铁精矿由于其性质特殊，烧结生产率较低。

sentences.english: The implications of increased productivity on printhead and system design will be discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了通过印刷头和系统设计提高生产率实质。

sentences.english: Unique structural design guaranteed the highly-efficient production.
sentences.chinese: 恒定的生产率，建基于独特的结构设计，。

sentences.english: By ploughing deep, the productivity of the soil can be greatly increased.
sentences.chinese: 经过深耕的要领，土地的生产率可以大地面进步。

sentences.english: Nil-pulley design, high effeciency, and good quality.
sentences.chinese: 引取为零滑动设计，生产率高，成本线品质优良。

sentences.english: Since the technical innovation, the output of latheshasincreased by six times .
sentences.chinese: 自从技术革新以来，劳动生产率已比平常高三至四倍。

sentences.english: Labor productivity is calculated by added value at current price.
sentences.chinese: 社会劳动生产率按现价增加值计算。

sentences.english: Takt time defines, based on the rate of sales, the rate of making products.
sentences.chinese: 节拍时间基于销售率制定产品生产率。
它能提高士气和生产率。

sentences.english: This migration will enable QVC to enhance productivity and profitability at its plant.
sentences.chinese: 此举将帮助QVC加强生产率和收益率。

sentences.english: The technology improves the sand discharge rate and the sand pumping production rate.
sentences.chinese: 此技术提高了卸沙速度与抽沙生产率。

definition: measures of national income and output
